titleInfo.title: Nathan Thomas and Eugene Hampton next to Hampton's City Council campaign sign

mods.abstract: Campaign manager Nathan Thomas (left) stands with Durham City Council candidate Eugene Hampton. Hampton was one of three black candidates for council seats. He lost a runoff to a white incumbent.

subject.topic: Civil rights movements -- North Carolina -- Durham

mods.note: Item description, identifier (if applicable), Box and Folder information. Durham Civil Rights Heritage Project (NCC.0040). North Carolina Collection, Durham County Library, NC.
